## Diff.IThreeWayDiff.metadata property

Summary metadata about the differences found.

Provides counts of added, removed, modified, and unchanged properties for quick assessment of the scope and nature of changes.

**Signature:**

```typescript
metadata: IThreeWayDiffMetadata;
```
